scripts.package-win: echo 'module.exports = {DEBUG : false}' > env.js; gulp;electron-packager ./ muwen --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --electron-version=1.8.6 --overwrite --icon=./dist/win-icon.ico --ignore="(dev)|(muwen-.*)|(windows-installer)|(docs)|(gulpfile.js)"; echo 'module.exports = {DEBUG : true}' > env.js;
scripts.package-mac: echo 'module.exports = {DEBUG : false}' > env.js;gulp; electron-packager ./ muwen --asar=true --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --electron-version=1.8.6 --overwrite --icon=./dist/mac-icon.icns --ignore="(dev)|(muwen-.*)|(windows-installer)|(docs)|(gulpfile.js)"; echo 'module.exports = {DEBUG : true}' > env.js;
